mapper.sql: petrol_id, petrol_num, petrol_psw, petrol_kind, petrol_denomination, petrol_price, state, discount, area, owner_id, petrol_type, create_at, update_at
mapper.insert: insert into czb_petrol (petrol_id, petrol_num, petrol_psw, petrol_kind, petrol_denomination, petrol_price, state, discount, area, owner_id, petrol_type, create_at, update_at) values (#{petrolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petrolNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petrolPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petrolKind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{petrolDenomination,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{petrolPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{petrolType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update czb_petrol
petrol_num = #{petrolNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
petrol_psw = #{petrolPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
petrol_kind = #{petrolKind,jdbcType=INTEGER},
petrol_denomination = #{petrolDenomination,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
petrol_price = #{petrolPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
petrol_type = #{petrolType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where petrol_id = #{petrolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update czb_petrol set petrol_num = #{petrolNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petrol_psw = #{petrolPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petrol_kind = #{petrolKind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, petrol_denomination = #{petrolDenomination,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, petrol_price = #{petrolPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, petrol_type = #{petrolType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where petrol_id = #{petrolId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT petrol_kind AS petrolKind, petrol_denomination AS petrolDenomination, petrol_price AS petrolPrice, discount AS discount from czb_petrol where state=1 GROUP BY petrolKind , petrolPrice,petrolDenomination,discount ORDER BY petrolPrice DESC
